alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 6:29PM EDT until May 10 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Iron County in south central Upper Michigan... West central Dickinson County in south central Upper Michigan... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florence, or 10 miles southeast of Crystal Falls along the upper Michigan and Wisconsin stateline, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Iron and west central Dickinson Counties, including the following locations... Merriman, Randville, Sagola, Granite Bluff, Stager and Peavy Falls Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
